example.name: arg1
example.text: No part of any appropriation for the current fiscal year contained in this or any other Act shall be paid to any person for the filling of any position for which he or she has been nominated after the Senate has voted not to approve the nomination of said person . ''
example.arg: of any positionor which he or she has been nominated after the Senate has voted not to approve the nomination of s

example.name: Not Events!! Call .YY.
example.text:
Spoon on some filling ; pineapple , cherry , apple , pumpkin -LRB- pick one -RRB- fold the dough over to cover the filling and pinch the edges together .
He has a significant number of uh fillings /.
example.note: If you can replace "filling" with "jelly" or similar, it is not an event! Also, bits of metal that you can see in people's teeth (dental fillings) are not events! To use this sense, make sure the reference is to the ACT of filling something.

example.name: arg2
example.text: They worked out a cement filling mining method , so that the average quantity mined per person per shift is 17.6 tons , reaching an internationally advanced level .

roleset.name: fulfill, satisfy

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: ...he met nothing charged in the whole process from outpatient service to prescription making and prescription filling .

roleset.note: Based on instances in BOLT P01, part 7. Framed by Claire. Related to verb entry fill.06

example.text: The filling in of filter tips with acetate fiber
